StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetTotalContractsNWAs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @Ac.vityDate as date.me, @Ac.vityEndDate as date.me AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @Organiza.onType as Varchar(3)
SET @Organiza.onID = COALESCE(@Organiza.onID, 900) SET @Organiza.onType = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID)
SELECT * INTO #SUBORGS FROM dbo.GetOrgHierarchy(@Organiza.onID)
IF (SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(8), @Ac.vityEndDate, 108)) = '00:00:00' BEGIN SELECT @Ac.vityEndDate = DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -10, DATEADD(DAY, 1, @Ac.vityEndDate)) END
--- GET CONTRACTS SELECT SO.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, SO.LONG_NAME AS NAME, 1 AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, COUNT(C.CONTRACT_ID) AS ACTIVITY_COUNT FROM #SUBORGS SO INNER JOIN NWA N ON (SO.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AND COALESCE(N.COMP_CHANGE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y') INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, @Ac.vityDate, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, @Ac.vityEndDate) >= 0) WHERE SO.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, SO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, @Ac.vityDate) >= 0 GROUP BY SO.ORG_ID, SO.LONG_NAME
UNION
--- GET NWAs SELECT SO.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, SO.LONG_NAME AS NAME, 2 AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, COUNT(N.NWA_ID) AS ACTIVITY_COUNT FROM #SUBORGS SO INNER JOIN NWA N ON (SO.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, @Ac.vityDate, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, @Ac.vityEndDate) >= 0 AND COALESCE(N.COMP_CHANGE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y') WHERE SO.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, SO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, @Ac.vityDate) >= 0 GROUP BY SO.ORG_ID, SO.LONG_NAME ORDER BY SO.LONG_NAME, ACTIVITY_TYPE
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #SUBORGS SET NOCOUNT OFF
